>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Var Element

id:: td-000014

######################################################################

This SML document contains a 'var' data element.  The 'var' statement
tells an application that the block of text is the text of a variable
definition.

At a recent training class, [var:head-count] individuals learned about
SML.  SML is a language still under construction. [var:disclaimer]

var:: head-count = 26

var:: disclaimer = Some assembly required.  Batteries not included.
Your mileage may vary. Proceed at your own risk.  May contain
peanuts. Do not use while sleeping. Do not use if you are pregnant or
may become pregnant.

<<<DOCUMENT
